DOCKER="/usr/local/bin/docker" [ -x "$DOCKER" ] || DOCKER="/opt/homebrew/bin/docker"
# Wait for Docker daemon until "$DOCKER" info >/dev/null 2>&1; do echo "Waiting for Docker Desktop to start..." sleep 5 done
# Wait for vault-postgres container until "$DOCKER" ps --filter "name=vault-postgres" --filter "status=running" --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^vault-postgres$'; do echo "Waiting for vault-postgres container..." sleep 5 done
# Start Vault exec /opt/homebrew/opt/vault/bin/vault server -config /absolute/path/vault.d/vault.hcl
